page.title: 11The dismantled railway
page.content: There was an old railway in our area called the{Somerset and Dorset}Joint Railway.It started running in about the 1880's,and stopped in 1966.Along the railway line,there still remains a few{pill boxes.}It went through Mid- somer Norton and the Chilcompton area. There is an old tunnel that has been blocked off.The lane that runs over it is called{"Tunnel Lane".}Some of the line is owned by a farmer who keeps cows on it.In a lot of places the cutting has been filled in.It was commonly used by people going to the {South Coast}from{Liverpool}and{Man- {chester.}There are banks along the edge and where rails used to be there are now stones.At the end of the line where the tunnel is, there is now a {rifle range.}People nowadays go {walking}and{blackberry picking}along the old line.
